text: Horipsestis aenea is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Wileman in 1911. It is found in Taiwan, the Chinese provinces of Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Fujian, Guangxi, Hainan, Sichuan and Yunnan and in Vietnam. ==Subspecies== *Horipsestis aenea aenea (Taiwan) *Horipsestis aenea minor (Sick, 1941) (China: Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Fujian, Guangxi, Hainan, Sichuan, Yunnan) *Horipsestis aenea roseobasalis Laszlo, G. Ronkay, L. Ronkay & Witt, 2007 (Vietnam) ==References== Category:Moths described in 1911 Category:Thyatirinae
title: Horipsestis aenea
